content: autumn sweater is perfect for those who´ve got some knitting skills but worry about tackling a larger project icelandic-style sweaters are an excellent starting point with helpful video tutorials and this free pattern you´ll expand your knitting horizons pick up new techniques and feel more self-assured about tackling sweaters moreover using large needles 6 0mm means you´ll see your progress in no time there are video tutorials to supplement written instruction part 1 https //youtu be/0ss8vxlnqly part 2 https //youtu be/trucf3mztgg part 3 https //youtu be/bgnlk1ssdek sizes xs s m l xl xxl bust circumference 97 102 106 111 115 120 cm 38 2 40 1 41 7 43 7 45 3 47 2 inches
